steps.dialogue_text:
Bandit Leader: Well, well... what do we have here?
Bandit Leader: Hand over your gold, and we'll let you live!

Narrator: You defeated the bandits!
Narrator: Among their belongings, you find a crude map...

steps.message_text: The map reveals the location of the bandits' main hideout!

steps.dialogue_text:
Narrator: Defeat... The bandits overpower you and take your valuables.
Narrator: You wake up later on the roadside, bruised but alive.

Narrator: You managed to escape the bandits!
Narrator: Better to live and fight another day...
